I've listed a batch of two Manga for sale on Ebay to do some
fundraising fo=
r the costs of the forthcoming Journal of Japanese
history. These are two m=
anga that deal with the bakumatsu period. From
the Ebay description:

These=
 are two Japanese Bakumatsu era themed manga - "Sono Toki Rekishi
ga Ugoita=
 - Bakumatsu Edition", which covers seven historical events
from the Bakuma=
tsu era of Japanese history, including the now
legendary Ikedaya Incident, =
in which the Shinsengumi killed and
captured Choshu loyalists at the Ikeday=
a inn, the assassination of
Sakamoto Ryoma, and "The Last Battle of Hijikat=
a Toshizo". The "Sono
Toki" manga series is based on the NHK television ser=
ies of the same
name which dramatically examines seminal moments in Japanes=
e history
from a purely historical perspective. This manga was published in=

2003, and is 504 pages.

The Second manga is "Hidamari no Ki", a fictional=
ized account of
events during the Bakumatsu period by Tezuka Osamu, with st=
ories about
Henry Heusken, Townsend Harris, and other notable Bakumatsu era=

figures. This manga was published in 2002, and has 336 pages. There
are so=
me minor stains on the outside edge, but it is in good
condition. Both mang=
a have colorful dust jackets which are in good
condition, and are Japanese =
imports.


Here is the Ebay link to the auction:
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBa=
yISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3D190123948646

I will be selling off at least one=
 more Japanese history related batch
after this auction finishes. Help supp=
ort the Journal!
